channel.title: World of Brine
channel.description: World of Brine is a ttrpg podcast of words and worlds; meandering conversations and actual play games. #oyab #named
channel.itunes:author: brine

description.p: This is the first episode in a new series of conversations between myself, Wightbred and whomever else. We talk about Wightbred's new zine, Unnammed Worlds; the magic system in brine's game Of Yarn and Bone; how we run ttrpg games and a number of other rambling topics.
0. By the powers vested in me (which are none), I give you permission to do anything, change anything or ignore anything that results in a better game for you and your players. Forever.

item.title: Night City - One Shot
item.description: Amongst the jukebox joints and DJ dives, there are only four lounges left in downtown **Night City** where a band can get a regular gig. At least, one that will keep the landlord at bay for another month.

item.title: Butchers - 01 The Butcher, The Baker and The Clandestine Faker
item.description: Welcome aboard the Delta Queen, your ticket to cosmic extravagance and discovery! This interstellar marvel stands as one of only two remaining Halo Class Cosmos Cruisers in the galaxy, promising a journey unlike any other. Glide through the stars in unparalleled style and grace, surrounded by timeless elegance at every turn. And when hunger strikes, prepare your taste buds for a culinary odyssey courtesy of the legendary Chef Xanathor, whose creations will leave you starry-eyed with delight. So come, embark on the adventure of a lifetime aboard the Delta Queen, where each voyage is a cosmic escapade into the great unknown of space!

item.title: Butchers - 00 Session Zero
item.description: This is session 0 for a new Traveller/Named game. If you were ever curious about "how the sausage gets made", you're in luck! And that's _TWO Ls_.

item.title: Stamford Bridge - 02 Rather Be Lucky Than Good
item.description: The final chapter in our Stamford Bridge adventure. Does Jens make it aboard one of twenty four ships that returned to Norway? NO SPOILERS!

item.title: Stamford Bridge - 01 Pretty Girl
item.description: Jens awakes on the banks of the river Derwent. The Battle of Stamford Bridge is over. It was a battle of Harolds and Jens' Harold has fallen. What now?

item.title: Southern Coast - 04 A Better Door than a Window
item.description: In our final episode of The Southern Coast, Hergest leaves the Prison of Mon and finds not one, but two familiar faces... or is it three?

item.title: Skypirates of Jotnaar - 05 Release The Kraken
item.description: The final session of Skypirates of Jotnaar... NO SPOILERS!!!1!

item.title: Skypirates of Jotnaar - 04 Hexspire Strikes Back
item.description: The captains head to Last Drinks to concoct Rainsborough's "simple" plan. Logistics consume everyone's time until news comes over the skwawkbox...

item.title: Southern Coast - 03 The Prison of Mon
item.description: Hergest travels alone to The Prison of Mon to find help with a fell beast. He hopes The Hag Kalg--a prisoner there--might provide some answers. Two comrades remain at the logger's camp; infected with an insatiable hunger. Using magic, Hergest has taken on part of their burden.

item.title: Skypirates of Jotnaar - 03 Three Lacy Shirts to the Wind
item.description: Dalt buys lacy shirts for all three captains as they plot against Hexspire.

item.title: Southern Coast - 01 The Mad Monk
item.description: Hergest travels to Fellstead Monastery on the Southern Coast. He's asked to check in on a Logger's Camp in need of healing. He is accompanied by Sir Ealdred, and Brother Estabar, and on their way, they meet _The Mad Monk_...

item.title: Skypirates of Jotnaar - 02 Hexspire Marks the Spot
item.description: The crew returns to Hag's Knife full of helium and two captured ships. During the ensuing celebration, Captain "Lacy" Rainsborough wakes grasping a map... to a treasure of dark secrets.

item.title: Skypirates of Jotnaar - 01 Are We Warriors or Worriers?
item.description: an actual play, in which Captain "Lacy" Rainsborough gets the answer to the penultimate question -- are we warriors or worriers?

item.title: The Frost Spire - Part 4
item.description: It's PCs vs Polar Bear... my money is on the _bed_. Don't lose your hand!

item.title: The Frost Spire - Part 3
item.description: While ascending the Frost Spire, the crew come upon a ~~roadblock~~ knight in non-shining armor. As Wrath would tell you, returning from the dead is easy compared to climbing an ice tower in full plate. But the crew ties a rope around him and schleps him along (lest be stuck waiting for his slow-ass). Revenants--come to find out--like throwing rocks and hitting things... who knew :shrug:

item.title: The Frost Spire - Part 2
item.description: Oh no! He's hot! A frozen sea is no place for a himbo... I mean, if there is nobody around to gaze lovingly into the eyes; strong jawline and moonstruck mustache of a handsome man... is he really handsome? Oh, and there's some wolves or something... whatever. Now MOVE! You're blocking his moonlight.

item.title: The Frost Spire - Part 1
item.description: The Arson Crew find themselves in the middle of an old fey tale. "The Ice Prince" is legend. A prince lives who travels the seas in a castle of ice; his wives feasting on children who misbehave.

item.title: S1E24 Shot Through The Heart And You're To Blame
item.description: **THE SEASON 1 FINALE IS HERE!** `No spoilers` but Death returns... good luck, crew!

item.title: S1E23 Eat Your Heart Out
item.description: Are three McMuffins better than one? We find out in this episode! Also, _what's with the bowl of fish?_ Yulia meets The Lady of Light and gets the answers to her heart's desires.

item.title: S1E22 Meddling Kids
item.description: The Scooby crew break into **The Temple of the Lady of Light**. McMuffin concocts a _cunning plan_ to dress up as delivery men, while Yulia battles an evil broom closet!

item.title: S1E21 Let Sleeping Salt Circles Lie
item.description: Gorath and Yulia walk into a mirror... but are instead whisked away by a rift in time. They meet a nice man inside a salt circle... nothing to see here.

item.title: S1E20 Burning Down the House
item.description: Watch out, you might get what you're after; cool Birdy, that lighter's getting lighter; this voodoo... looks a lot like me

item.title: S1E19 Closet Full of Skeletons
item.description: We all have skeletons in our closets...

item.title: S1E18 Attack of the Color Guard
item.description: "This color guard has teeth! The Crew face off with _Louie Bluie_ and his colorful friends... honestly the cat statue may have given them more of a problem"

item.title: S1E17 Never Trust a Cat Statue
item.description: The crew execute their _cunning plan_ and snoop around the **The Temple of the Lady of Light**. And they would have gotten away with it too _if it wasn't for that pesky cat statue_.

item.title: S1E16 Chillin' with the Tanpire
item.description: Our heroes navigate the mirror plane back to Malik Maxwell's (aka _The Tanpire). They rest up; have some funky dreams; do a little snooping; ask _all_ the questions; and formulate a plan!

item.title: S1E15 Little Orc's Room
item.description: Gorath visits the _little orc's room_ and then he crew travels through the mirror plane, looking for Malik's house. They meet some shiny ravens...

item.title: S1E14 The Mirror Plane
item.description: Welcome to the _Mirror Plane_! The crew meet a shiny spider...

item.title: S1E13 The Return of Naven Mag
item.description: Naven Mag returns! The crew find themselves back in _The Time Wizard's_ tower. More delicious tea; more _complicated_. They also fine out that _they can mirrorwalk_!

item.title: S1E12 Black Dog
item.description: Malik and the crew take on a **Black Dog**... then go for a swim in the **Infinity Fountain**.

item.title: S1E11 Malik Maxwell
item.description: The crew visit the home of Malik Maxwell; noted, local business man and borrower of magic books and expensive booze collector. And they tell him _every. thing.

item.title: S1E10 Sister Malora - Lady of Light High Priestess
item.description: In this episode we learn about orc mating rituals when Gorath presents a dead dog to Yulia :shrug:. They meet with Sister Malora, the Hight Priestess of the Lady of Light. And they tell here _every. thing._

item.title: S1E9 Cloud City
item.description: The crew lands in Cloud City! Gorath is being followed by a Black Dog; they run into _Little Baby Drekel_; and they learn about a murder mystery...

item.title: S1E8 Is That a Musket In Your Pocket?
item.description: The Toucan crew is back on the board with Santo but but make an emergency landing. Not for more beer (though :thinking:) but because of a storm. They build a fire right by an Owl Bear nest and McMuffin realizes _he has a musket_ and he's not afraid to use it!

item.title: S1E6 A Debt for the Dead - Part 1
item.description: The crew fly through a stitch in time and find themselves... well... dead. We are also introduced to _Breakfast Donuts_!

item.title: S1E5 Death and McMuffin
item.description: In order to save his parents, our _reluctant sailor_, McMuffin dies and bargains with Death!

item.title: S1E2 Hissy Fit
item.description: The crew travel by balloon to McMufin's home town of ~~Hissy Fit~~ **Hsifilet**.

item.title: S1E1 A Balloon for Gorath
item.description: Wait... McMuffin has a bird? In this first episode of **Season 1**, we meet McMuffin's pet toucan, **Birdie**; which has _somehow_ always been sitting on his shoulder? Whatever. We are also introduced to **Santo Regulus Dumont**; a professional drinker and aeronaut hobbyist.

item.title: S0E4 Tower of the Time Wizard
item.description: Today on GorathCast...

item.title: S0E3 Tower of the Time Wizard
item.description: Death becomes us! The 3rd floor puzzles the party and the 4th... well... it's complected.

item.title: S0E2 Tower of the Time Wizard
item.description: The players make it to the 2nd floor of the tower and...

item.title: S0E1 Tower of the Time Wizard
item.description: This was the very first session of what was _supposed to be_ just a oneshot... but would become a full campaign.
